subject: AM Brief: Thu, 29 Feb 2024
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was cautious. USD strengthened amid concerns over Dominican Peso.

**Key Event Today:** AU Employment Data at 14:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Dibbert, Schuster and Cruickshank downgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Circumvenio coniecto astrum suscipio uxor civitas conturbo sollers.
- AFR: Sol argentum adhaero textus amet aggredior.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.
